attributes.action: End discrimination by Private Landlord and Letting agents against all people on Housing Benefit
attributes.additional_details:
There is a current housing shortage for those working on low incomes and those claiming benefits. It is true that more Social Housing needs to be built. However, there are hundreds of thousands of private properties available to rent across the country which could be taken up immediately by those in need if Letting Agents, Landlords and indeed mortgage providers did not out rightly discriminate against the poor!
Help stop this discrimination immediately!
